page.title: 14MY HOUSE IN LOWDHAM.
page.content: My house is very unusual because it is one of the oldest houses in Lowdham village.It was built about three hundred years ago. It used to be a public house called The White Lion.In fact,The White Lion Public House is listed in an old book called 'Wright's Directory' which was printed in 1868. Inside the house there are still hooks in the kitchen where they used to hang meat.In the loft there is a room where the owner used to do his work. Outside there is a little passage down the side of the house.Up at the top of the garden there are lots of trees where we hide and play games.
